Package com.alvermont.javascript.tools.shell

Contains a slightly modified version of the Mozilla Rhino Javascript Shell.

Class Summary
ShellConsoleTextArea Class that provides the extended text area for the shell
ShellContextFactory A context factory for use by the shell
ShellEnvironment ShellEnvironment, intended to be instantiated at global scope, provides a natural way to access System properties from JavaScript.
ShellGlobal This class provides for sharing functions across multiple threads.
ShellJSConsole  
ShellMain The shell program.
ShellSecurityProxy  
 

Package com.alvermont.javascript.tools.shell Description

Contains a slightly modified version of the Mozilla Rhino Javascript Shell. The modifications are mostly to make it a better citizen as part of a Swing application. This includes changes to when the thread is started and removal of the calls to System.exit(). The code to change the UI look and feel has also been removed. It is assumed that the main application will handle this.

Related Documentation

For overviews, tutorials, examples, guides, and tool documentation, please see:
  • http://www.mozilla.org/rhino
